languages.text: "Пусть Черногрив ведет тебя во тьме ночной, Железношкурый. Знай, что если твоя стая призовет, Зловещий вой всегда откликнется!"
"May Blackmane guide you through the black of night, Ironhide. Know that if your pack calls, the Baleful Howl will always answer!"
languages.original_text: "Пусть Черногрив ведет тебя во тьме ночной, Железношкурый. Знай, что если твоя стая призовет, Зловещий вой всегда откликнется!"

traits.locale_text: "May Blackmane guide you through the black of night, Ironhide. Know that if your pack calls, the Famehungry will always answer!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "May Blackmane guide you through the black of night, Ironhide. Know that if your pack calls, the Famehungry will always answer!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "May Blackmane guide you through the black of night, Ironhide. Know that if your pack calls, the Baleful Howl will always answer!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “愿黑鬃指引你走过漫漫长夜，铁皮。别忘了，如果你的狼群呼唤伙伴的话，怒嚎者永远都会回应你！”
languages.original_text: "May Blackmane guide you through the black of night, Ironhide. Know that if your pack calls, the Baleful Howl will always answer!"

traits.locale_text: “愿黑鬃指引你走过漫漫长夜，铁皮。别忘了，如果你的狼群呼唤伙伴的话，渴名者永远都会回应你！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Que la Crinière Noire te guide dans les ténèbres de la nuit, Peau-de-Fer. Sache que si ta meute a besoin des Hurleurs sanguinaires, elle pourra toujours compter sur eux ! »
languages.original_text: "May Blackmane guide you through the black of night, Ironhide. Know that if your pack calls, the Baleful Howl will always answer!"

traits.locale_text: « Que la Crinière Noire te guide dans les ténèbres de la nuit, Peau-de-Fer. Sache que si ta meute a besoin des Dévoreurs de gloire, elle pourra toujours compter sur eux ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「アイアンハイド、ブラックメインが夜の闇を導いてくれることを祈ろう。お前の群れが呼べば、破滅の咆哮はいつでも応えよう！」
languages.original_text: "May Blackmane guide you through the black of night, Ironhide. Know that if your pack calls, the Baleful Howl will always answer!"

traits.locale_text: 「アイアンハイド、ブラックメインが夜の闇を導いてくれることを祈ろう。お前の群れが呼べば、破滅の咆哮はいつでも応えよう！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Que Melenanegra le guíe en la oscuridad de la noche, Piel de Hierro. Y ten por seguro que, si tu manada te llama, ¡el Aullido Torvo siempre responderá!».
languages.original_text: "May Blackmane guide you through the black of night, Ironhide. Know that if your pack calls, the Baleful Howl will always answer!"

traits.locale_text: «Que Melenanegra le guíe en la oscuridad de la noche, Piel de Hierro. Y ten por seguro que, si tu manada te llama, ¡los Hambrientos de Fama siempre responderán!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Möge Schwarzmähne Euch durch die schwarze Nacht führen, Eisenhaut. Wisset, wenn Euer Rudel ruft, werden die Baleful Howl immer antworten!"
languages.original_text: "May Blackmane guide you through the black of night, Ironhide. Know that if your pack calls, the Baleful Howl will always answer!"

traits.locale_text: "Möge Schwarzmähne Euch durch die schwarze Nacht führen, Eisenhaut. Wisset, wenn Euer Rudel ruft, werden die Famehungry immer antworten!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Gecenin karanlığında Karayele rehberin olsun Demirpost. Sürün çağırırsa Uğursuz Uluma cevapsız bırakmayacak, bunu da bilesin!"
languages.original_text: "May Blackmane guide you through the black of night, Ironhide. Know that if your pack calls, the Baleful Howl will always answer!"
